column5: Hey all,  As most of you are aware, I am hardcore into hockey pools! I'm willing to set it up, if enough people are interested in joining.  I am thinking 8 teams.  So, let's say the first 7 people to send me a PM with their email address, get in.  It will be a Yahoo! Pool. You need a Yahoo email account to join the pool. If you dont have one, you can sign up in about 45 seconds, lol.  Don't hesitate to ask any questions!  Cheers, *Stoty
Bragging rights, sorry I should have mentioned that!

Sorry, also....it will be a LIVE ONLINE DRAFT.  Sunday, Sept 20, 7:00pm.  If you cant make it to a computer, then you can pre-rank your players, and the computer will automatically choose your team for you. It will go by your pre-ranking list first, then just choose the next highest ranked player that hasn't been chosen yet. It's a wicked system.  Obviously, if you can be on the computer its much better, then you can choose your own team!
How many leaf players can I pick?  LOL
Since I'm a nice guy....you can take the whole team
For anyone who joins, the draft starts at 7, but you need to sign in between 630-659, or else the computer will pick your team for you. The draft order will be done randomly by the computer at 630.
still a few spots left for anyone who wants in.
A couple people who wanted in, haven't signed up yet, so there are still 2 spots left, first come first serve. Please join ASAP, so the spots are filled.
Anyone interested? Need to fill 2 spots!
Only one spot left!  First come, first serve!
